text: @GOPLeader You are worrying about unemployed but Trump wasn’t worried about Coronavirus for 60 days. The whole problem started when Trump started watching his Stock Market Economy TANK. So Trump lost it & started freaking out. Why is he threatening to sue states that air him talking ads?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
